page.title: 12Ownership and types of car.
page.content: In our area we have found that about two thirds of the people have one or more car.One third of the people have no car.Some people in our area are not on a high wage so they cannot afford to buy or run a motor car.76% of the cars were Saloons,12%were Estates and 12% were vans.44% of the cars were Fords,eg. Granada,Capri,Escort and Cortina.5% were British Leyland eg.Triumph,Austin Rover ,Jaguar, Daimler, Range Rover.Other British cars include Morgan and Rolls Royce.13% were Vauxhall.27% were foreign eg . Citroen ,Renault, B.M.W, Fiat Datsun Nissan Toyota Mercedes. Most families enjoy using their car for holidays etc.A few cars were specially adapted for the physically disabled people to drive.
